name: illustrate
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: illustrate
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to draw pictures for a book, magazine, etc.

example.egtrans: 配有精美插图的书／旧手稿

dsense.name: illustrate
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to show the meaning or truth of something more clearly, especially by giving examples

example.eg: The lecturer illustrated his point with a diagram on the blackboard.
example.egtrans: 讲师在黑板上用图表来说明自己的观点。

example.eg: This latest conflict further illustrates the weakness of the UN.
example.egtrans: 最近的这次冲突进一步说明了联合国的软弱。

example.eg: The exhibition will illustrate how life evolved from water.
example.egtrans: 这次展览将展示生命是如何从水中演化而来的。
